active_projects.description: Complete phase 3 of task 660: Finite Model Property Port. Port FMP to parametric architecture with explicit cardinality bounds on finite models. This provides decidability foundation (orthogonal to completeness chain). Follow-up from task #660.
Fix unused simp arguments in TemporalProofStrategies.lean. Remove Formula.swap_temporal_involution from simp calls at lines 174, 203, 242, 459 where the linter reports it is unused.

Complete phase 5 of task 700: Ultrafilter-MCS Correspondence. Fill ultrafilterToSet_mcs consistency proof - show that if L ⊢ ⊥ and all [φᵢ] ∈ U, then ⊥ ∈ U. Requires relating list conjunction to fold of quotients. (Follow-up from task #700)

active_projects.description: Complete phase 6 of task 700: Algebraic Representation Theorem. Prove ultrafilter existence (consistent_implies_satisfiable) using Zorn's lemma adaptation - for any non-⊥ element a, there exists ultrafilter containing a. Also complete mcs_ultrafilter_correspondence bijection proof. (Follow-up from task #700)
Establish a full decision procedure for the Bimodal/ logic.
Provide an ultraproduct-based proof of compactness for TM logic.

Complete phase 4 of task 630: Prove mem_extractTrueAtomSet_iff helper lemma. This establishes that p ∈ extractTrueAtomSet b ↔ SignedFormula.pos (.atom p) ∈ b. The proof is mechanical (induction on branch with case splits on Formula constructors: atom, bot, imp, box, all_past, all_future for both pos and neg signs). Currently has sorry at Theories/Bimodal/Boneyard/Metalogic_v2/Decidability/BranchTaskModel.lean:269. (Follow-up from task #630)

active_projects.completion_summary: Proved mem_extractTrueAtomSet_iff lemma establishing p ∈ extractTrueAtomSet b ↔ SignedFormula.pos (.atom p) ∈ b. Used generalized accumulator induction pattern with match-split for all 12 sign/formula cases.

active_projects.research_summary: Research completed for indexed family coherence conditions. Analyzed four coherence condition sorries (lines 433, 439, 448, 456) in IndexedMCSFamily.lean. Identified proof strategies using temporal axioms (Temporal 4, Temporal K distribution). Forward_G and backward_H are directly provable from seed construction (5-7 hours). Forward_H and backward_G require MCS negation completeness lemma (additional 4-5 hours prerequisite). Created comprehensive report with phased proof strategy, case analysis patterns, and dependency analysis.

artifacts.summary: Research report analyzing four coherence conditions with proof strategies, dependencies, and implementation recommendations
Comprehensive analysis of coherence blocker, Boneyard patterns, and architectural solutions for task 658

Analysis of T axiom impact: NOT including T axioms makes proofs impossible (fundamental construction issue). Adding T axioms would make coherence trivial. Recommends adding T axioms or accepting limitation.

Detailed comparison of Option B1 (Recursive Seeds) vs Option B2 (Relational/Coherent Construction) for completing coherence proofs. Recommends Option B2 (relational approach via Task 681) due to proven Boneyard pattern and dense time support.

Dependency chain analysis: representation_theorem incorrectly uses superseded construct_indexed_family instead of construct_coherent_family. Documents code-documentation mismatch and refactoring plan.
Revised plan v7 incorporating research-005 findings: switch representation_theorem to use construct_coherent_family
Final implementation summary: Phases 3-4 complete, coherent construction now used

active_projects.partial_summary: Phase 1 complete (T-axiom closure lemmas). Phases 2-6 blocked by fundamental construction issue: independent Lindenbaum extensions prevent coherence proofs. Requires construction redesign (Option B).
active_projects.completion_summary: Completed switch of representation_theorem to use coherent construction. Phases 3-4 finished: analyzed superseded code (kept for reference), updated documentation line numbers. Build passes. Coherence proofs now definitional via CoherentConstruction.lean.

active_projects.description: Remove the mathematically false theorem semantic_task_rel_compositionality and its sorry from SemanticCanonicalModel.lean. Research confirmed this theorem cannot be proven (unbounded duration sums exceed finite time domain), and it is not needed for the completeness proof which uses a different approach. Remove the false claim rather than accepting a sorry for an unprovable statement.

active_projects.description: Implement the .opencode system upgrade plan following specs/agent_system_upgrade_plan.md and specs/implementation_roadmap.md. This 6-week upgrade involves 4 phases: Phase 1 (Week 1): Foundation - file-based metadata exchange and state management; Phase 2 (Week 2): Workflow Ownership Migration - transfer postflight responsibilities to subagents; Phase 3 (Weeks 3-4): Meta System Builder Port - enable dynamic system extension; Phase 4 (Weeks 5-6): Forked Subagent Pattern - achieve token efficiency.
